Run this code on your local machine to pull data from the API (hosted on remote server)

### Load Libraries

```{r}

library("httr")
library("jsonlite")

```

### Access the hello world API

```{r}

# Read IP address from file for privacy
ipv4 <- scan("../ipv4.txt", what="character")

# Initialize the API Call
call <- paste0("http://",ipv4,":8080/echo?msg=howdy!")
call

# Get result from API
get_hello <- GET(url = call)

# Get status of HTTP Call
status_code(get_hello)

# Converting content to text
hello_text <- content(get_hello, "text", encoding = "UTF-8")
hello_text

# Parsing data in JSON
hello_json <- fromJSON(hello_text, flatten = TRUE)
hello_json


```
